title: New: Mosa Wild – Smoke
body:
Been a while since I’ve heard a band announce themselves with the level of ambition that Ashford’s **Mosa Wild** demonstrate on their debut track, _Smoke._

Part The National, part Mumford third record, part Springsteen – it’s a smile inducing epic, and one of the most exciting first offerings I’ve heard in quite some time.

excerpt.full: Been a while since I’ve heard a band announce themselves with the level of ambition that Ashford’s Mosa Wild demonstrate on their debut track, Smoke. Part The National, part Mumford third record, part Springsteen – it’s a smile inducing epic, and one of the most exciting first offerings I’ve heard in quite some time.
